title: #226: Profiling Detective Trapp Part 2
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue their discussions with LA Times journalist Christopher Goffard and go behind the scenes of his hit podcast Detective Trapp.


#DetectiveTrapp

#VictimsMatter

#CoerciveControl

#SerialPerpetrator
